info.name: Wedeyet
info.description:
**Wedyet - Navigation Web App**

Wedyet is a web application designed to help users navigate through Addis Ababa, Ethiopia.

- The app allows users to search for different places such as shops, cafes, hospitals, and more.
- Each place is displayed on a map and provides important details such as image, title, description,  
    services, open hours, phone number, Telegram account, and directions.

item.name: Auth

request.description:
### Register Route

- JSON Data for all required ones
- Only SuperAdmin can create Admin - superAdmin token must be added as token

### Login Route

- use \[email, password\] OR \[phoneNumber, password\] to authenticate

## Update Route

- Must be Authenticated
- Only user can update his account only except superadmin

## Current User

- must be authenticated
- get current signed in user

## Get User

- must be authenticated
- get user by id

## Get All Users

- must be authenticated
- ADMIN - only gets all admins
- SUPERADMIN - gets All

## Delete User

- must be authenticated
- the user delete his own account only except SUPERADMIN
### Logout route

item.description:
### Authentication Module

User Model

- firstName - required
- lastName - required
- phoneNumber - required , must be Unique
- email - required, must be Unique
- password - required , minimum - 8
- role - Must be one of them \["ADMIN" ,"SUPERADMIN" \]

item.name: Search Place by Name , Category , Area , SubCategory

request.description:
## Search Place

- name - name of the place
- category - places category
- subcategory - places subcategory
- area - places area
    

Return the most related place with inserted query

request.description:
## Search Nearby Place

- name - name of the place
- category - places category
- subcategory - places subcategory
- location - user's current location in latitude , longitude form
    

Return the nearest place with distance

response.name: Search Nearby  Location

request.description:
## Get All Places

- Return all registered places

response.name: Get All Places

request.description:
## Delete Place by ID

- Delete place with id

#### **Upload Multiple Images to Place**

- dont't forget to insert places ID
- upload images of place to cloud
- Max image size must be below 3 MB
- can upload upto 4 images

item.description:
**Place Route**

KEY **? means Optional field**

- name
- description
- area - like \['"Bole bras","Megenagna"\]
- phoneNumber - unique
- category :"Category" OR "Service" module
- subCategory : "SubCategory" OR "SubService" module
- address : descriptive address in relative condition
- website : required
- telegram: required username excluding @ symbol
- location : lat, long
- branchs **?** optional
- openHours: **?** optional Object for Each Days start and end time like {"Monday":"8:30AM-05:30PM"} by default it sets most common used monday to friday 8:30-5:30 and saturday 8:30 - 12:00
- images **?** optional

item.name: Services

request.description:
## Create Service

- create service by indicating it's unique name only
    

returns created service on success

## Get Place by Id

- id - insert existing id
    

Return existing service by it's id if exisst

## Get All SubServices By Category

Return all services with it's subservices

request.description:
## Get All SubServices By ID

Return all subservices with service ID

## Get All Services

Return all services

## Update Services

- id - id of the place
- name - name of the place

## Delete Service

- id - id of the place

item.description:
### Service

- name - must be unique service name must be descriptive and can add sub services to it

item.name: Sub Service

request.description:
## Create Subservice

- name - name of sub service
- category - subservices category OR service
    

Return the newly created subservice

## Get Subservice

- id - id of sub service
    

Return the existing subservice this id

## Get All Subservices

Return all subServices

response.name: Get All  SubServices

request.description:
## Update Subservice

- id - id of sub service
- name - name of sub service
- category - subservices category OR service
    

Return the newly updated subservice

## Delete Subservice

- id- idof sub service

item.description:
## Subservice

- name - name of subservice
- category - where it belongs to Category | Service
